code: import React from'react';import'./BookDetail.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookDetail=_ref=>{let{book,onClose}=_ref;const renderStars=rating=>{return'⭐'.repeat(rating)+'☆'.repeat(5-rating);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-overlay",onClick:onClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"modal-close",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-detail-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.thumbnailUrl,alt:book.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-detail-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"label",children:"Rating:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"value",children:[renderStars(book.rating)," (",book.rating,"/5)"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"label",children:"Price:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"value price",children:["\xA3",book.price.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"label",children:"Availability:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"value ".concat(book.inStock?'in-stock':'out-stock'),children:book.stockAvailability})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"label",children:"Last Updated:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"value",children:new Date(book.scrapedAt).toLocaleDateString()})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:book.detailPageUrl,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"view-original",children:"View on Original Site \u2192"})]})]})]})});};export default BookDetail;
